description: This program breaks the collection of images from a GroupInCorr file back into individual AFNI 3D+time datasets.

group_in_corr_file.title: GroupInCorr File
group_in_corr_file.description: GroupInCorr file to extract datasets from (e.g. AAA.grpincorr.niml)

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix to prepend to dataset labels. Use 'NULL' to skip the use of the prefix.
